definition: debtor (jocular term, homonymous with 富翁[fu4 weng1])
to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)
elderly man/father/father-in-law/neck feathers of a bird (old)

sentences.english: It isn't just the young and indebted who haven't written a will.
sentences.chinese: 而未留遺囑的，不僅僅是年輕人和負翁。
